author: Special Correspondent - Vsp
text:
GENERAL

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Annual Sweet Festival, 10 a.m.

PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research: Conclave on ‘Engineering educational system and industry expectations,’ 9 a.m.

Akshaya College of Engineering and Technology: Blood donation camp, 9 a.m.

Ministry of Information & Broadcasting: Event by Directorate of Field Publicity, Morning star centre, Kinathukadavu, 11 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Seminar on ‘Nanomaterials Research,’ 10 a.m.

Kathir College of Engineering: Seminar on ‘Fundamentals of leadership,’ 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Training on ‘Into the clouds,’ 10 a.m.

CMS College of Engineering & Technology: Talk on ‘Electronic manufacturing services,’ 11 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Campus placement drive by The Royal Bank of Scotland, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Workshop on ‘Unified functional testing, 9.30 a.m.

Sudha Hospital: Conference on ‘Infertility,’ Hotel Le-Meridian, 10:30 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Programme on ‘First aid,’ 9 a.m.

Sasi College of Architecture and Business: Cultural festival, 9 a.m.

Avinashilingam University: Research convention, Thiruchitrambalam Auditorium, 10 a.m.

SNS Institutions: Inter-college chess tournament, 10 a.m.

Dr.N.G.P. Arts and Science College: Meeting on ‘Opportunities and challenges in bio entrepreneurship,’ Kambar Arangam, 10 a.m.

PSGR Krishnammal College for Women: Inter-college cultural festival, 5:30 p.m.

POLLACHI

Arjun College of Technology: Inter-collegiate Kabaddi tournament, Municipal circus grounds, Pollachi, 2 p.m.

UDHAGAMANDALAM

Keystone Foundation & Nilgiri Natural History Society: Talk by Andre Leu, Place to Bee, Club road, 4.30 p.m.

The Nilgiris Education and Research Foundation: Seminar on ‘The driving forces and the process of development in the mountain communities of the Nilgiris,’ HADP Training Centre, 10.30 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering: Symposium for polytechnic students, 10 a.m.

Confederation of Indian Industry and NIFT-TEA Knitwear Industry: Conference on ‘Performance enhancement towards world class manufacturing,’ Srinivasa Mahal, 9.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
